about_the_game:
MatchyGotchy Z Fun Pack was created because of a request from our community, and here we have a DLC with brand new wallpapers! We designed five colorful themes: Zoottastic, Eggsome, MatchyMart, Zootlandia and Rocket Scientists. All available for 16:10, 16:9 and 4:3 desktop monitors.



2560 x 1440 is a 16:9 screen ratio which also works for:
1920×1080, 1600×900, 1366×768, 1280×720, 1152×648, and 1024×576.

2560 x 1600 is a 16:10 screen ratio which will also work for:
1280×800, 1440×900, 1680×1050, 1920×1200.

2048 x 1536 is a 4:3 screen ratio which will also work for:
1920×1440, 1856×1392, 1600×1200, 1440×1080, 1400×1050, 1280×960, 1024×768, 960×720, 800×600, and 640×480.

Thank you for your support, and thank you for being part of the Matchyverse!

We also do giveaways for this DLC for people who join our Discord and Newsletter.
